data.name: QUO - Within The Backrooms
data.detailed_description:
A Y2K Research Group [a systemic bug affecting computer equipment due to the millennium change in the year 2000] accidentally opened a portal to the Backrooms. Your mission is now focused on exploring, identifying and securing this unknown area and minimising the possible consequences of the other side of this reality on our own.



Your objective is to enter the portal to the Backrooms at the controls of QUO, the autonomous robot explorer charged with this mission.



You will report to two agents: Agent Dana, in charge of the engineering unit. She herself implemented the new system for sending and receiving samples. And Agent Fox, the biologist investigating the unusual behaviour of the hives that have begun to spread through level zero.



Others have accepted this mission before you and have not returned. That was the fate that befell the first squad that raided the area. Their whereabouts are unknown, they lost connection with the headquarters and it is unknown whether they are dead or alive. Since that incident, only autonomous robots have had access to the area. Now it's your turn.

A dystopian first-person horror adventure inspired by Backrooms that mixes liminal spaces and science fiction.

Features


  • Immersive experience thanks to the careful use of binaural sound and realistic graphics.
  • Explore level 0, discover its secrets and keep an eye out for entities.
  • Take your mission and live the most realistic Backrooms experience.

data.short_description: A first-person dystopian-horror sci fi-liminal adventure inspired by Backrooms. In this mission you are QUO, an autonomous robot explorer. Trace, probe and delve into an unexplored reality full of enigmas and dangers. Now it's your turn.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 SP2 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel G4560/Athlon 200GE or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030/RX 460 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Target for 1080p, High Settings, 60 fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 SP2 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060/RX 580 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Target for 4k, High Settings, 60 fps

content_descriptors.notes: A little blood and some viscera, the usual stuff a Wanderer sees on any given day.
